rukus.text: And they said: should we follow him, a single human being among us? Then indeed we are in error and madness
Is the reminder only given to him among us? No, he is a rude liar
Tomorrow they are going to know who the rude liar is
Indeed We are senders of the female camel as a test for them, so watch them and be patient
And inform them that the water is shared between them, and each drinking is to be attended
But they called their companion, and he took (a knife) and killed (her)
So how were My punishment and My warnings
Indeed We sent a single awesome roar upon them and they became like dried broken straws of a barn maker
And We have certainly made the Quran easy to understand, so does anyone take notice
People of Lot denied the warnings

a favor from Us. That is how We reward anyone who thanks
And he has certainly warned them of Our assault, but they doubted the warnings
And they have certainly demanded his guest from him, so We blinded their eyes, so taste My punishment and My warnings
And certainly a lasting punishment took them by early morning
So taste My punishment and My warnings
